name: NEO PEPE
description: NEO Pepe is a crypto meme coin, deployed on the Ethereum Blockchain, to serve as a Decentralized Community token with a mixture of branding from Pepe and Neo. You have to let it all go, PEPE . Fear, doubt, and disbelief. Free your mind. 97% of the tokens were sent to the liquidity pool, locked liquidity, contract renounced. Remaining 3% of the supply held in multi-sig wallets for future CEX listings, bridges, liquidity pools and marketing. During development, the team will also list $NEPE on big CEXs to increase accessibility and make the investment process easier for investors. This is the true $Pepe, which encourages community, memetic warfare against normies and financial freedom following the philosophy of DeFi.
